title: Here’s How You Can Get to Hawaii for Only 25,000 Miles Frugal Travel Guy

type_specific.selection: Korean Air gets a bad reputation for their miles being hard to use. I’m sure you’ve heard horror stories about how you need to fax in proof of family members (birth certificate, marriage license, etc.) in order to book a ticket for anyone other than yourself…the horror! I mean, who owns a fax machine anymore? […]
